text: Deliver Us from Evil is a 2014 American crime horror movie. It is about a New York City police officer who gets pulled into a case that is demon-related. Eric Bana plays the officer, Ralph Sarchie. Olivia Munn plays his wife. The movie is based on a 2001 book called Beware the Night. Screen Gems distributes the movie. The movie was released on July 2, 2014. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2014 horror movies Category:2014 drama movies Category:2014 crime thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:2010s American crime thriller movies Category:Religious horror movies Category:2010s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about police officers Category:Movies about demons Category:Movies about exorcism Category:Movies about Christianity Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Iraq Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies directed by Scott Derrickson
title: Deliver Us from Evil
